chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Unto thee will I cry, O LORD my rock; be not silent to me: lest, if thou be silent to me, I become like them that go down into the pit.
items.plainText: Unto thee will I cry, O LORD my rock; be not silent to me: lest, if thou be silent to me, I become like them that go down into the pit.

items.text: Hear the voice of my supplications, when I cry unto thee, when I lift up my hands toward thy holy oracle.
items.plainText: Hear the voice of my supplications, when I cry unto thee, when I lift up my hands toward thy holy oracle.

items.text: Draw me not away with the wicked, and with the workers of iniquity, which speak peace to their neighbours, but mischief is in their hearts.
items.plainText: Draw me not away with the wicked, and with the workers of iniquity, which speak peace to their neighbours, but mischief is in their hearts.

items.text: Give them according to their deeds, and according to the wickedness of their endeavours: give them after the work of their hands; render to them their desert.
items.plainText: Give them according to their deeds, and according to the wickedness of their endeavours: give them after the work of their hands; render to them their desert.

items.text: Because they regard not the works of the LORD, nor the operation of his hands, he shall destroy them, and not build them up.
items.plainText: Because they regard not the works of the LORD, nor the operation of his hands, he shall destroy them, and not build them up.

items.text: Blessed be the LORD, because he hath heard the voice of my supplications.
items.plainText: Blessed be the LORD, because he hath heard the voice of my supplications.

items.text: The LORD is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.
items.plainText: The LORD is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.

items.text: The LORD is their strength, and he is the saving strength of his anointed.
items.plainText: The LORD is their strength, and he is the saving strength of his anointed.

items.text: Save thy people, and bless thine inheritance: feed them also, and lift them up for ever.
items.plainText: Save thy people, and bless thine inheritance: feed them also, and lift them up for ever.
